channel.title: Homes on Yuxuan Liang
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Yuxuan Liang

item.title: Academic
item.description: The highly flexible website framework for Hugo with an extensible plugin mechanism. Create a beautifully simple site in under 10 minutes ðŸš€ Latest release Star

Biography I am now a first-year PhD student in School of Computing at National University of Singapore, supervised by the Professor Roger Zimmerman and Provost’s Chair Professor David S. Rosenblum. I have published over ten papers in the refereed journals and conferences, such as TKDE, KDD, IJCAI, AAAI and UbiComp. Thanks to the supervision of Prof. Yu Zheng and Dr. Junbo Zhang, I started my research career at MSRA and graduated from Xidian University.

item.title: News
item.description: Jun. 2020: One paper was accepted by TKDE 2020 Jun. 2020: Two papers were accepted by ECML-PKDD 2020 May. 2020: Two papers were accepted by KDD 2020 May. 2020: One paper was accepted by TKDE 2020 Mar. 2020: Invited to serve as a PC member for NeurIPS 2020 and ECML 2020 Mar. 2020: Three papers were accepted by TBD and IJCNN Jan. 2020: One paper was accepted by UbiComp 2020

item.title: Awards & Honors
item.description: Outstanding Winners of The Interdisciplinary Contest in Modeling 2015 [via] CCF(China Computer Federation) Elite Collegiate Award The star of graduates in Xidian University ACM/ICPC Shaanxi province silver medal Research Scholarship at NUS: 2019-2023 National Scholarship (four times): 2015, 2016, 2017 and 2018 National Scholarship for Encouragement: 2014 AAAI 2020 Student Travel Grants ACM SIGKDD 2019 Student Travel Grants ACM SIGSPATIAL 2017 Student Travel Grants

item.title: Custom Section
item.description: This is an example of using the custom widget to create your own homepage section. To remove this section, either delete content/home/teaching.md or edit the frontmatter of the file to deactivate the widget by setting active = false.

item.title: Community Services
item.description: Program Commitee Member and Reviewer NeurIPS 2020, AAAI 2020, ECML-PKDD 2020, SPATIALDI 2020 Journal Reviewer IEEE Transactions on Knowledge and Data Engineering (TKDE) IEEE Transactions on Mobile Computing (TMC) Proceedings of the ACM on Interactive, Mobile, Wearable and Ubiquitous Technologies (IMWUT) IEEE Transactions on Intelligent Transportation Systems (TITS) IEEE Transactions on Audio, Speech, and Language Processing (TASLP) Neurocomputing Information Sciences Transportation Research Part C IEEE Sensors Journal Multimedia Tools and Applications Conference External Reviewer 2020: KDD, IJCAI 2019: KDD, IJCAI 2018: KDD, CIKM, SDM 2017: KDD, CIKM, CCFAI 2016: ICDM, SIGSPATIAL
